articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Palestinian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Palestinian President
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Thursday sent a reply message to Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization.
					 The message expressed deep thanks to the Palestine president for extending the warm congratulations and wishes on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the great leader of the Korean people Kim Il Sung, and the 50th anniversary of establishment of the diplomatic ties between the two countries.
					
					 It reaffirmed the DPRK's full support and solidarity for the just cause of the Palestinian people.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Moldovan Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Moldovan Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Vladimir Voronin, chairman of the Party of Communists of the Moldovan Republic, on April 15.
					 The message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un and all the people of the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) in the name of the communists of the Moldovan Republic.
					
					 For this formal state holiday the Korean people could hold Comrade Kim Il Sung, genuine patriot of Korea, fighter for the right of the working people and founder and leader of the DPRK, the message said, and went on:
					
					 The career and feats of the distinguished great man are becoming a paragon of devotion and tenacity.
					
					 Despite all difficulties and moves of the imperialists the people of the DPRK are steadily struggling to realize the ideal of justice while preserving their sovereignty and the right to their development as instructed by the founder of the party and state.
					
					 On this holiday I wish the working people of the DPRK strong one, wellbeing and peaceful future.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un good health and success in all his work.

articles.title: Chairman of DPRK Red Cross Society Sends Notice to President of S. Korean Red Cross
articles.content:
Chairman of DPRK Red Cross Society Sends Notice to President of S. Korean Red Cross
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK Thursday sent the following notice to the president of the Red Cross of south Korea:
					 We have strongly urged your authorities more than once to disclose the truth behind the group allurement and abduction of citizens of the DPRK by gangsters of the Intelligence Service of your side in Zhejiang Province, China in broad daylight and to immediately and unconditionally send the abductees back and sternly punish or hand over to the inviolable court of the DPRK side those involved in the abduction.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that I sent through media a notice in which I requested your side to take immediate technical measures for the families of the abductees to go to Seoul via Panmunjom to have face-to-face meetings with their daughters and confirm their will, as your authorities unreasonably assert that what happened recently was "group defection from the north at free will".
					
					 But your authorities categorically turned down our just request to have the earnest wish of the families of victims realized, while talking about "international practice."
					
					 We cannot but view this otherwise than a mean and childish act to prevent the truth behind the premeditated and organized group abduction from being revealed.
					
					 We know details of how the gangsters of the Intelligence Service of your side worked out a scenario from the beginning to lure and take the innocent citizens of the DPRK to south Korea and put it into practice, and have evidence proving the crime.
					
					 The evil-minded agents of the Intelligence Service of your side, in conspiracy with brokers in China, allured and abducted the group of citizens of the DPRK in the most base and vicious manner to take them to south Korea. This hideous unprecedented crime against humanity has touched off towering indignation of the public at home and abroad.
					
					 What is all the more intolerable is that your authorities separately put the abductees in custody in  solitary rooms and are pressurizing them into "defection" by employing all possible means of appeasement, deception, threat and blackmail while keeping them strictly away from the outside.
					
					 Our citizens are now on hunger strike, strongly demanding their prompt return to their motherland. Some of the girls have fallen in a faint.
					
					 We cannot but ask if this is "humanitarianism" and "defence of human rights" often touted by your side.
					
					  A big question is for what reason they have been detained in solitary rooms, kept away from the outside and prevented from expressing their own will if they had gone to south Korea at "their free will".
					
					 Your side is preventing parents from meeting their children under the pretext of "international practice." This is the height of inhumanity.
					
					 It is universally accepted international practice and humanitarianism to ensure the earliest possible reunion between parents and children who had been separated from each other against their will.
					
					 Your side does not have any reason whatsoever to refuse to meet the just demand of the DPRK to let the parents directly meet their children to know what they want.
					
					 Your side has already completely lost face to talk about reunions of separated families and relatives as you divided their harmonious families by taking their beloved children from the embrace of their parents.
					
					 We regard the Red Cross of your side's fence-sitting attitude towards the hideous group abduction as an inhumanitarian act of diametrically running counter to the noble spirit of Red Cross.
					
					 We would like to remind your side of possible unimaginable and catastrophic consequences if the situation is allowed to go on.
					
					 If the Red Cross of your side remains true to the humanitarian mission, it should play a role in making your authorities apologize for the allurement and abduction, unconditionally and immediately send back the abductees and sternly punish those involved in the monstrous crime.
					
					 As an immediate step, we once again strongly demand your side take prompt technical measures to ensure that the families of the abductees meet their children face to face in Seoul.
					
					 If your side persistently turns down our just demand, your side will have to be accountable for all ensuing serious consequences.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Demands S. Korean Regime Send Back DPRK Abductees
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Demands S. Korean Regime Send Back DPRK Abductees
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in a statement on Thursday warned that if the south Korean puppet regime fails to send back group citizens of the DPRK allured and abducted by the Intelligence Service under its manipulation early in April, the DPRK will take a merciless counteraction.
					 The statement said:
					
					 No sooner had the incident occurred than the DPRK vehemently censured the brutal act of the puppet regime and strongly urged it to unconditionally send back the abductees without delay, severely punish or send those involved in the abducting operation to a sacred court of the DPRK and take prompt technical measures to help the families of the DPRK side meet their children face to face in Seoul.
					
					 But the Park regime flatly turned down the just demand of the DPRK, terming it a "far-fetched assertion" and the abduction a "group defection made at free will" and spouting such sheer sophism that it "cannot accept the demand for face-to-face meeting of families in view of international practice."
					
					 The above-said incident was a premeditated and organized group allurement and abduction Park Geun Hye perpetrated by hurling gangsters of the Intelligence Service to all intents and purposes.
					
					 Under the direct instruction of Park, bandits of the IS, in conspiracy with an already bribed agent and brokers in China fooled and lured 12 gullible women citizens of the DPRK to a Southeast Asian country by telling them they were to tour the area for service as a new restaurant would be inaugurated in another country, and then let them take a flight to south Korea from there.
					
					 When the abductees learned in the plane that it was flying to south Korea, not a third country, and demanded their return to their homeland, the gangsters of the IS deceived them by telling they should carry out a "special task" and took them to south Korea in a forcible manner.
					
					 The Park regime is putting pressure upon them to "defect" by employing all base and heinous methods such as appeasement, deception, threat and blackmail after keeping them in solitary confinement and imposing a news blackout, etc., so that they are kept away from any contact with outside.
					
					 The abductees of the DPRK are now staging a hunger strike in demand of immediate repatriation and some young girls are in a critical condition after falling in a faint.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet forces are talking volumes about the DPRK citizens' "skepticism about social system in the north" and their "admiration" at south Korea.
					
					 The DPRK citizens abducted by the puppet forces have no ground whatsoever to defect to south Korea by abandoning their native places and parents, brothers and sisters.
					
					 It is a sheer lie that they are "admiring" south Korea, a veritable hell torn with appalling confusion, as they translated their dreams and ideals into realities under the best social system centered on the popular masses in the DPRK.
					
					 Now that the puppet forces produced "new divided families" through allurement and abduction, they should not even dream of talking about the reunion of separated families and relatives and solution to humanitarian issues.
					
					 The Park group, keen on confrontation, bereft of reason, far from judging the grave consequences to be entailed by its crimes, had better drop far-fetched assertion to justify its inhuman abduction and stop at once its gangster-like act and unconditionally and immediately send back the innocent abductees.
					
					 It should take prompt technical measures to enable the families of the victims to go to Seoul and meet their daughters face to face and bring them back home as unanimously demanded by them.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Delegation
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions headed by President of its Central Committee Pan Noymany who is member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 The head of the delegation asked Kim Yong Nam to convey to Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, greetings of Bounnhang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					
					 He was pleased with great achievement made by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation, he said, expressing the will to make positive contribution to developing the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Lao Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Lao Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions headed by President of its Central Committee Pan Noymany who is member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 Members of the delegation paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 In the halls where the great leaders lie in state the guests paid homage to them.
					
					 They went round the halls in which orders the great leaders received are on display and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Syrian Party Supports Just Cause of WPK, Korean People
articles.content:
Syrian Party Supports Just Cause of WPK, Korean People
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party made public a statement on April 20 in support of the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people.
					 It has paid deep attention to the achievements made by the Korean people under the guidance of the WPK, the statement said, affirming the will to wage worldwide joint struggle against the U.S. arbitrary practices and aggression moves.
					
					 Syria and the DPRK have conducted joint struggle against the enemies, it noted, extending full solidarity to the WPK, the government of the DPRK and the friendly Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and defending the sovereignty of the country under the leadership of First Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party supports the WPK and the government of the DPRK in their efforts to reunify Korea, avert a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and protect regional peace and security.
					
					 It urges the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and respond to the DPRK's proposal for replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace accord.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of activists of the Korean Youth League in Japan under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday.
					 They laid a bouquet before the statues of the peerlessly great men and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) "The ever-victorious WPK" was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.
					 On display there are at least 70 photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there are more than 150 photos showing the revolutionary spirit of the army and people of the DPRK all out in the charge to bring about world-startling miracles and feats in the annals of revolution and bring earlier the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, made an opening speech.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony its participants looked round the venue of the exhibition.

articles.title: DPRK's Educational System for Musical Instrument Production
articles.content:
DPRK's Educational System for Musical Instrument Production
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A regular educational system for manufacturing musical instruments has been established at Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory in the DPRK.
					 The faculty of musical instrument manufacture appeared at the Conservatory in Juche 100 (2011), with a five-year education system. Its mission is to educate students in professional knowledge about the production of traditional and other musical instruments. 
					
					 Its subjects include the basic education and majors related to the manufacture of keyboard, stringed, woodwind, brass and percussion instruments.
					
					 Some time ago the faculty produced its first-term graduates, who won top prizes at national musical instruments exhibitions in 2013 and 2015. They developed new technologies of making stringed and woodwind instruments with locally available materials.
					
					 The birth of the educational system for making musical instruments was thanks to leader Kim Jong Il. In December 2010 he initiated the establishment of this system and gave a detailed instruction for it, referring to the formation of its teaching staff, textbooks and reference books and practice.
					
					 Showing deep care for the faculty's operation, supreme leader Kim Jong Un stressed several times the need to put the study and manufacture of traditional instruments on a scientific basis and enroll promising students.

articles.title: Chongryon Continues Helping Disaster-Hit Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Chongryon Continues Helping Disaster-Hit Koreans in Japan
Tokyo, April 27 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) keep rendering help to the compatriots who suffered damage done by the quake in Kumamoto area, Kyushu, Japan to bring their living to normal. 
					 The chairman of the Kumamoto Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, officials of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of the Korean Youth League in Japan and an official of the Fukuoka Prefectural Chamber of Commerce visited disaster-stricken compatriots to convey sympathy money and relief materials in the name of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon on April 25.
					
					 On April 26, officials including the chairman and the chief secretary of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association conveyed sympathy money and relief materials to disaster-hit Koreans on the spot.
					
					 The Korean youth commercial associations across Japan are launching a fund-raising campaign to aid disaster-hit Koreans and organizations and compatriots including the Central Standing Council of the Union of Korean Educational Association in Japan, Kyushu Korean Middle and High School and mothers societies of Korean schools at various levels are sending sympathy money to disaster-hit Koreans.

articles.title: U.S. Is Chiefly to Blame for Nuclear Arms Race in 21st Century: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Is Chiefly to Blame for Nuclear Arms Race in 21st Century: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- In recent days, U.S. media and military experts asserted that owing to the Obama administration's frantic modernization of nuclear weapons, there is imbalance among nuclear forces of big powers and a fresh Cold War is in the offing.
					 This is the right claim because it reflects the hard fact that the nuclear arms race of the 21st century, a fresh Cold War arousing the deep concern of the world, has already started and the U.S. is chiefly to blame for it.
					
					 The U.S. emerged the "world's only superpower" without even a drop of blood as the Cold War was over after the collapse of the Soviet Union late in the 20th century.
					
					 Since the demise of the Cold War, the U.S. has persistently pursued the vicious policy of strength for the purpose of checking the appearance of any big power capable of matching it.
					
					 However, its moves for dominating the world and making the world unipolar further hardened the will of other big powers to keep the balance of the strategic muscle with the U.S. while accelerating the economic development.
					
					 Much upset by this, the U.S. is putting spurs to the projects for putting nuclear weapons and launching systems on a smaller, stealth and precision basis behind the curtain of the deceptive signboard of "denuclearization".
					
					 It is now busy developing five types of fresh nuclear warheads and their delivery means with huge financial support and mulling having access to bomber-launched long-range cruise missiles capable of striking targets after overcoming the enemy's missile defence system through long-distance flight.
					
					 Both Russia and China are channeling greater efforts into bolstering up strategic armed forces, paying attention to the fact that the U.S. is hell-bent on the moves for modernizing nuclear weapons while openly talking about the military containment of the regional powers.
					
					 Russia has already started the deployment of long-range ballistic missiles of the new generation tipped with four miniaturized nuclear warheads and is developing submarine nuclear striking means.
					
					 At the end of last year the commander of the Strategic Rocket Force of Russia said the new type strategic missile system accounted for 56 percent of the armed forces of Russia, openly declaring that in the light of analysis of the military information available, the U.S. cannot ward off its intensive attack.
					
					 China is surpassing the U.S. by far in developing the "ultra supersonic glider" capable of striking any target on the earth within an hour.
					
					 It conducted the test fire of new type ICBM Dongfeng-41 with the firing range of 15 000 km capable of striking the eastern part of the U.S. on April 12.
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. moves for modernizing nuclear weapons to dominate the world are becoming a boomerang, threatening the U.S. itself.
					
					 Shortly ago, the chief of Staff of the U.S. Army in his report on the combat capability of the U.S. forces made at a hearing of the Armed Services Committee of the Senate admitted that "in case the U.S. fights a war against the DPRK, China, Russia and other military powers at any moment, the U.S. forces' capability has not reached the desired level." His remarks reflect the U.S. unfavorable position.
					
					 The start of the nuclear arms race in the 21st century means the one of ruin of the U.S.
					
					 Had the U.S. not resorted to the moves for escalating tension in the world such as modernization of nuclear weapons to make the world unipolar, such words as the fresh Cold War and collapse of the American Empire would not have appeared.
					
					 The U.S. is bound to meet its final doom as it is hell-bent on realizing the anachronistic scenario for dominating the world.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Instigating Conservative Body to "Coloring" Racket
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Instigating Conservative Body to "Coloring" Racket
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea (Jongdaehyop) released a statement Monday censuring the puppet regime for instigating the conservative forces to a "coloring" racket.
					 The statement said it is quite natural that victims of sexual slavery, Jongdaehyop and all citizens are staging actions in protest against the humiliating "agreement" with Japan on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Chongwadae prodded a conservative body into staging a rally against Jongdaehyop, branding it as a "pro-north organization," it noted.
					
					 Stressing that the people keep sharp eyes on the moves of the bungling rulers, the statement said they would never pardon the reckless racket of the regime to eliminate the "followers of the north" and check the proper solution to the issue of sexual slavery.
					
					 The Chongwadae should probe the truth behind the case and apologize to the people, it demanded.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Term Remaining Period of Park Geun Hye's Office Worrisome
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Term Remaining Period of Park Geun Hye's Office Worrisome
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People in an editorial on Wednesday chided the puppet chief executive for mocking at the people's mindset manifested in the general election.
					 On Tuesday she expressed her stand related to the election outcome before news and editorial chiefs and other senior media persons at Chongwadae.
					
					 Addressing them, she spouted a litany of sophism, claiming that in the general election the public judged "a vegetable-like National Assembly," not her regime.
					
					 The editorial denounced her for strongly hinting that she would remain unchanged in the remaining period of her office in her narrow-minded political understanding such as passing the whole buck for the miserable heavy defeat in the general election on others though she confirmed it and her coercive ruling method.
					
					 Noting that Park's misrepresentation is very serious, the editorial termed the closing period of her office "worrisome."

articles.title: Enforcement of "Anti-Terrorism Law" Opposed in South Korea
articles.content:
Enforcement of "Anti-Terrorism Law" Opposed in South Korea
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Members of the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and other civic and social organizations of south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet government building on April 21, at which they opposed the puppet authorities' moves to enforce an evil law against human rights, according to the south Korean News One.
					 They said the Intelligence Service is getting undisguised in its arbitrary practices and human rights abuses in the wake of the passing of the "bill on combating terrorism."
					
					 The institution of such law precisely means terrorism, they charged.
					
					 They declared that they would stage actions against the "enforcement ordinance of the anti-terrorism law."

articles.title: Arab Regional Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Arab Regional Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- An Arab regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Cairo on April 12.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse events to praise the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and introduce proud achievements made in socialist Korea.

articles.title: Literary Works Praising Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Published in Russia
articles.content:
Literary Works Praising Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Published in Russia
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Literary works were published with due ceremony in Moscow on April 19 in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included anthologies "Day of Sun Is Marked through Generations" and "Unfading Star of Memories" and books "Unprecedented 70 Years" and "Correct Understanding of Trust in Leader in DPRK".
					
					 Poet Lyudmila Abzeyeva in the anthologies gave her great impression of the celebrations for the centenary birth of President Kim Il Sung which she watched during her visit to Pyongyang in 2012 and said highly of the President who founded the Juche idea in his early years, put forward the masses as the masters of the country and regarded it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven all his life.
					
					 Book "Unprecedented 70 Years" written by Rabrentsi Gurzhiyev dealt with the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people who have emerged victorious under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Vitali Revedev, chief of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, wrote in his book "Correct Understanding of Trust in Leader in DPRK" that he keenly felt the heartfelt and ardent respect of the Korean people for the leader during his stay in the DPRK, adding that this is based on their purest and sincere mind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Figures of Mongolia, Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Figures of Mongolia, Brazil
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Mongolia and Brazil on April 12 and 13 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development briefed on the brief biography of the President and stressed that the President was born into a poor family and dedicated his whole life to the country and its people.
					
					 The chairman of the Mongolia-Democratic Korea Friendship Bridge Association praised the President as a kind-hearted father of the Korean people and the world progressives as well, recollecting the loving care the President and leader Kim Jong Il shown for his mother, an employee of former Mongolian School of Korean War Orphans, and his family.
					
					 A vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil noted the President founded the Juche idea, the acme in the history of human thought, made the masses become the masters of the country and vigorously led the world oppressed people's struggle for freedom and liberation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Honored in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Honored in Venezuela
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Guarico Bolivar State Legislative Council and the Juan German Roscio Nieves District Council of Venezuela awarded orders of honor to President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 A ceremony of conferring the orders was held at the building of the State Legislative Council on April 23 on the theme of "On paying the highest tribute to H.E. Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK, on the occasion of his birth anniversary." It was co-sponsored by the Guarico Bolivar State Legislative Council and the Juan German Roscio Nieves District Council.
					
					 Read out there were decisions on awarding the Order of Dr. Juan German Roscio Nieves First Class and the Order of Honor of Hugo Rafael Chavez Frias, supreme commander of the Bolivarian Revolution, to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The orders and diplomas were conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Venezuela.

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates an article to the 37th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Thoroughly Establishing the System of Party Leadership".
					 The work, published on April 28, Juche 68 (1979), deals in detail with theoretical and practical matters in establishing the system of the party leadership.
					
					 The period since the publication of the work represents proud years in which a dynamic drive has been waged for thoroughly establishing the system of the party leadership and the party's leadership over the revolution and construction has been fully ensured, the articles notes, and goes on:
					
					 The modeling of the party ranks on the monolithic idea and their organizational consolidation have been realized on a higher stage, the revolutionary trait of devotedly implementing the party's lines and policies have come to prevail throughout the party and society and the political, military and economic potentials of Korean-style socialism have grown stronger than ever before through the struggle to thoroughly establish the system of the party leadership.
					
					 The Korean revolution has entered the phase of a leap forward in the efforts to accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 We have the task of accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution which was started by President Kim Il Sung and emerged victorious under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il. What is the most important for doing so is to thoroughly establish the unitary leadership system of Marshal Kim Jong Un throughout the party and society.
					
					 Herein lies the way of remarkably boosting the might of the country, the power of single-minded unity and invincible military power, and achieving the final victory of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Austrian Organization
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK on its website on April 22 in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decade-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and that the cause of the party is always sure to triumph.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India
Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea on the theme of "Essence of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" took place in India on April 18 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the seminar were figures of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, the Indian Society for Juche Idea-Self-reliance Studies, the University of Delhi, Jamia Milia Islamia University, the Public News and other Juche idea study organizations and institutions.
					
					 Harish Gupta, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, and other speakers said not only the Korean people but also the world progressives are looking back with deep emotion on the life of the President, the great sun of the 20th century, on the occasion of his birth anniversary as he performed undying exploits before the times and history.
					
					 They praised the President for founding the Juche idea and successfully applying it.
					
					 They explained the validity, truth and great vitality of the Juche idea founded and developed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Presidente de CC de ACR de RPDC envia aviso a su homologo de SCR de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Presidente de CC de ACR de RPDC envia aviso a su homologo de SCR de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia 28 al presidente de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea el siguiente aviso:
					Ya hemos demandado fuertemente en reiteradas ocasiones a las autoridades de vuestra parte revelar el verdadero aspecto de la atrocidad del secuestro colectivo a las ciudadanas de la RPDC, cometido a plena luz del dia por los gangsteres del Servicio de Inteligencia de vuestra parte en la provincia china de Zhejiang, devolver sin demora e incondicionalmente a las secuestradas y someter al castigo duro o al sagrado tribunal de la RPDC a los involucrados en el caso. 
					
					En particular, dado que las autoridades de vuestra parte insisten injustamente en que el presente caso es la "fuga colectiva segun la voluntad libre", envie a Vd. por medio de la prensa el aviso que demanda tomar de inmediato las medidas practicas necesarias para que los familiares de las secuestradas puedan salir a Seul por via de Phanmunjom y encontrarse con sus hijas para confirmar con sus propios ojos la voluntad de las secuestradas. 
					
					Pero, las autoridades de vuestra parte niegan obstinadamente nuestra justa demanda de satisfacer el deseo ferviente de los familiares de las victimas, hablando de las "costumbres internacionales". 
					
					Lo calificamos de actitud villana destinada a impedir el descubrimiento de la verdad del secuestro colectivo premeditado y organizado. 
					
					Ya conocemos los detalles desde la operacion previa hasta la ejecucion del presente crimen cometido por los gangsteres del Servicio de Inteligencia de vuestra parte y tenemos tambien los testigos correspondientes. 
					
					Los canallas del Servicio de Inteligencia de vuestra parte secuestraron en colectivo a las ciudadanas de la RPDC y les llevaron al Sur de Corea con el metodo mas grosero y cruel en complicidad con los intermediarios en China. Este crimen de lesa humanidad sin precedentes provoca gran indignacion del interior y exterior del pais. 
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que las autoridades de vuestra parte obligan con la conciliacion y engano, la amenaza y chantaje la "sumision" a las secuestradas encarceladas en cuartos individuales y aisladas completamente del exterior.
					
					Ahora las secuestradas libran la lucha de ayuno demandando fuertemente devolverlas a la patria. Y algunas muchachas de poca edad estan en desmayo agonico.
					
					Pues, tengo que preguntarle a Vd. si esto es el "humanitarismo" y "defensa de derechos humanos", de que habla tanto vuestra parte.
					
					?Si nuestras ciudadanas fueron al Sur de Corea segun su "voluntad libre", por que ustedes les encarcelan por separado en las celdas individuales y les aislan y les impiden la expresion de la voluntad? 
					
					Vuestra parte imposibilita hasta el encuentro entre los padres y sus hijas hablando de las "costumbres internacionales", lo cual es el climax del crimen de lesa humanidad. 
					
					Facilitar lo mas pronto posible el encuentro entre los familiares separados en contra de su voluntad conviene a las universales costumbres internacionales y el humanitarismo. 
					
					Vuestra parte no tiene ninguna razon para no poder aceptar nuestra justa demanda de confirmar la voluntad de las  secuestradas en el encuentro con sus padres. 
					
					Y ya perdio la honra de hablar del encuentro de familiares y separados por haber desintegrado a la fuerza las familias armoniosas.
					
					Consideramos la actitud de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea que esta con brazos cruzados ante el presente incidente como proceder antihumanitario que contraviene fundamentalmente al noble espiritu de la cruz roja. 
					
					Volvemos a advertir que si se desprecia mas el presente caso, son inevitables las consecuencias inimaginablemente catastroficas. 
					
					Si la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja de vuestra parte es fiel de veras a la mision humanitaria, debe desempenar el papel merecido para que las autoridades surcoreanas pidan perdon por su crimen de secuestro colectivo, devuelvan de inmediato e incondicionalmente a las ciudadanas secuestradas y castiguen severamente a los involucrados en el presente caso. 
					
					Por inmediato, exigimos fuertemente una vez mas a vuestra parte tomar sin demora las medidas practicas necesarias para que los familiares de las secuestradas puedan ver a sus hijas en Seul. 
					
					Si sigue dando vista gorda a nuestra justa demanda, la responsabilidad por las graves consecuencias recaera enteramente sobre vuestra parte.

articles.title: CRPP advierte contramedida implacable a banda titere surcoreana
articles.content:
CRPP advierte contramedida implacable a banda titere surcoreana
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 28 una declaracion advirtiendo que se empezaran las contramedidas implacables si la banda titere surcoreana no devuelve a nuestras ciudadanas que fueron seducidas y secuestradas colectivamente a principios de abril por los gangsteres del Servicio de Inteligencia (SI) del Sur de Corea. 
					La nota subraya como sigue:
					
					Tan pronto como ocurriera este caso, denunciamos severamente tal acto bestial de la banda titere surcoreana y demandamos fuertemente a las autoridades y la entidad de cruz roja del Sur de Corea a devolver incondicionalmente y sin demora a nuestras ciudadanas secuestradas, dar castigo riguroso a los incorporados a este crimen o entregarlos a nuestro tribunal sagrado y tomar de inmediato las medidas practicas para que los familiares de nuestra parte se reunan personalmente con sus hijas en Seul.
					
					Pero, la horda de Park Geun-hye niega sin ton ni son esta demanda justa bajo las sofisterias absurdas como la supuesta "insistencia obstinada", la "fuga colectiva segun la voluntad libre" y "no puede aceptar la demanda de entrevista con familiares segun la costumbre internacional".
					
					Este incidente es de rabo a cabo el acto de seduccion y secuestro del colectivo realizado de manera planificada y organizativa por los gangsteres del SI bajo la orden de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Segun la orden directa de Park Geun-hye, los bandidos del SI que conspiraron con una escoria humana ya sobornada con dinero y los intermediarios del terreno chino, enganaron a las 12 norcoreanas ingenuas hablando de la necesidad de instalar un nuevo restaurante en otro pais y recorrer el terreno para el servicio movil y las tentaron a un pais del Sudeste Asiatico donde les hicieron tomar un avion hacia el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Cuando nuestras ciudadanas se dieron cuenta de que ellas mismas iban no al pais tercero sino al Sur de Corea despues de tomar el avion y resistieron demandando a devolver a la patria, los gangsteres del SI llevaron por la fuerza a todas ellas al Sur de Corea diciendo que hay que cumplir con el supuesto "deber especial".
					
					Ahora, la camarilla de Park les obliga la "sumision" a las chicas norcoreanas valiendose de todos los metodos viles y atroces como el adormecimiento y el engano, la amenaza y el chantaje encarcelandolas por separado y apartandolas cabalmente de la parte exterior bajo la rigurosa censura de prensa.  
					
					Dicen que ahora, nuestras ciudadanas desarrollan la huelga de hambre pidiendo fuertemente a devolverles de inmediato a la patria y unas jovenes de ellas estan desmayadas estando entre la vida y la muerte
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que la pandilla surcoreana pronuncia hasta los disparates de la "dubitacion sobre el regimen del Norte", la "simpatia con el Sur de Corea", etc.
					
					Nuestras ciudadanas tentadas y raptadas por la banda titere no tienen ninguna razon de ir al Sur de Corea abandonando su tierra natal, sus padres y hermanos.
					
					Es pura y absurda mentira que ellas, que vinieron floreciendo todos sus suenos e ideales en el mas ventajoso regimen social centrado en las masas populares, "simpatizan" con el Sur de Corea, infierno de confusion horrible.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos, que inventan nuevas "familias separadas" con el metodo de seducir y secuestrar de manera forzosa, no deben hablar nunca del encuentro de familiares y parientes separados y la resolucion del problema humanitario.
					
					La horda de Park Geun-hye que actua con frenesi por la confrontacion fratricida perdiendo el juicio sin pensar en las graves consecuencias futuras, debe abandonar de inmediato la insistencia obstinada tendente a justificar el crimen de rapto inhumanitario y el acto bandidesco a modo terco y devolver incondicionalmente a nuestras ciudadanas inocentes.
					
					Ademas, tiene que tomar cuanto antes las medidas practicas necesarias para que los familiares de las danadas se reunan en Seul y vengan personalmente con sus hijas segun su demanda unanime.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Laos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Laos
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 28 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de la Federacion de Sindicatos Lao presidida por Pan Noymany, miembro del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente del Comite Central de la federacion citada, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.
					En la ocasion Pan Noymany encomendo a Kim transmitir al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el saludo enviado por Bounnhang Vorachith, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao.
					
					Expreso el placer por grandes exitos alcanzados por el pueblo coreano en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y manifesto la voluntad de hacer contribucion activa al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion de larga historia entre los dos paises.

articles.title: BAAS apoya la justa causa de PTC y pueblo coreano
articles.content:
BAAS apoya la justa causa de PTC y pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe de Siria (BAAS) publico el dia 20 una declaracion apoyando la justa causa del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El documento senala que el BAAS presta profunda atencion a los exitos logrados por el pueblo coreano bajo la direccion del PTC y afirma la voluntad de desarrollar a escala mundial la lucha comun contra la arbitrariedad y la invasion de Estados Unidos que intenta dominar el mundo.
					
					Destaca que Siria y la RPDC libran una lucha comun contra los enemigos y expresa la entera solidaridad con la lucha del PTC, el gobierno de la RPDC y el amistoso pueblo coreano por construir un Estado prospero socialista y la soberania del pais bajo la direccion del Primer Secretario del PTC Kim Jong Un.
					
					Refiere que BAAS apoya los esfuerzos del PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC por realizar la reunificacion del pais, prevenir la provocacion de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y defender la paz y la estabilidad de la region.
					
					Por ultimo, demanda a EE.UU. aceptar la propuesta de la RPDC de abandonar la politica hostil y sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el convenio de la paz.
